projects.title: Dahlia asbl
projects.description: Dahlia asbl is a non profit association web site built in React. Whith Dahlia, you can make a donation throught PayPal, Visa card or Mastercard. Dahlia web  site is bilingual

projects.title: Dashboard Covid
projects.description: This project is about monitoring covid19 desease in DRC, managing health zones, updating dayly situation, Official dashboard of the Ministry of Health

projects.title: MagoEat Backend
projects.description: This is the backend project built with ExpressJs, Mongodb and Mongoose as the ORM. This app makes the frontend Mobile App dynamic and connects it to the database

projects.title: Books Helper
projects.description: A twitter-like web application to suggest books and impression on them between friends
